power.title: Anchor the Line
power.fluff: You help an ally stand or guide a friend back into formation
power.section: true Effect:Choose one of the following effects:
The target stands up as a free reaction.
The target shifts up to 1 square as a free reaction.
The target can reduce the maximum distance of all forced movement it is subject to by 2 squares until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Back to Back
power.fluff: You take heart from the ally guarding your back
power.section: true Effect:You assume the Back to Back stance.
true Until the stance ends, while you are adjacent to an ally, you and the ally gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls.
true The bonus to the ally's attack rolls increases to +2 for attacks granted by you.
true When an ally adjacent to you hits with an attack, the bonus to your attack rolls increases to +2 until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Dragon's Tenacity
power.fluff: You and your companions become as fierce and indomitable as dragons, striking harder the more you all are hurt
power.section: Requirement:You must be bloodied.

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and each ally in the burst

power.section: true Effect:You gain a +2 power bonus to attack attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
true Target allies gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. The bonus increases to +2 if the ally is bloodied.
true 1 Dragonborn:If you are a dragonborn, allies gain the increased bonus even if they are not bloodied.
true 1 An ally dragonborn increases the attack bonus he or she gains by +1.

power.title: Form a Line
power.fluff: You raise your fist in the air, calling your allies to form a defensive front at your position
power.section: true Effect:The wall creates a zone of defensive ground until the end of your next turn. The wall does not need to start in range, but you must include a square you occupy in the wall.
true You and any ally within the zone gain a +1 power bonus to AC. This increases to +2 while adjacent to you or an ally who is also within the zone.
true 1 Sustain Minor:The zone persists until the end of your next turn. You must be either within the zone or adjacent to an ally in the zone to sustain it.

power.title: Forward Observer
power.fluff: Discerning the proper angle of fire, you point out concealed enemies to your allies
power.section: true Effect:Until the end of your next turn, any ally who can see or hear you doesn't take the normal penalty to attack rolls for cover or concealment when attacking the target. The penalties for superior cover and total concealment still apply.

power.title: Get Down!
power.fluff: Your barked order draws attention to you long enough for a covered or concealed ally to hide
power.section: true Effect:The target can shift up to one-half his or her speed as a free reaction. The target can then choose to drop prone.
true If the target has cover or concealment, he or she can make a Stealth check to become hidden and has a +3 power bonus to the check and does not take the penalty for moving more than 2 squares.

power.title: Guide the Charge
power.fluff: You direct your ally's charge, allowing him or her to strike a deadly blow or to evade counter attacks
power.section: Trigger:An ally within 10 squares of you charges a creature
true Effect:The target gains your choice of one of the following two benefits:

true 1 On a hit, the target deals additional damage equal to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier, and can push the the target of the charge attack up to 2 squares, and then shift the same distance to a space adjacent to it.
true 1 The target gains a bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by the charge. The bonus equals your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.

power.title: Guileful Switch
power.fluff: You spring a trap on your opponents, surprising them with your clever stratagem
power.section: Trigger:Your turn starts

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and one ally who can see you

power.section: true Effect:The target ally immediately takes his or her next turn, and acts on this initiative from now on, and you delay until his or her next turn would have taken place.

power.title: Inspiring Reaction
power.fluff: As soon as an ally is wounded, you spring forward to keep him or her standing
power.section: Trigger:You, or an ally adjacent to you takes damage
1 Skirmishing Presence:The triggering ally can be within 3 squares of you, and you can shift 2 squares to a space adjacent to the ally before resolving the rest of the effect.
true Effect:The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value, plus additional hit points equal to your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.

power.title: Invigorating Remark
power.fluff: You call to an ally with words of inspiration, pushing him or her to fight on
power.section: true Effect:The target regains one expended healing surge, and also regains hit points equal to one-half his or her healing surge value.
true 1 Inspiring Presence:You can choose for the target to either regain an additional expended healing surge, or to regain additional hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Leader's Intercession
power.fluff: Brash impulse places you in the attack's path to spare an ally from harm
power.section: Trigger:An attack hits an ally adjacent to you, but not you
true Effect:You and the target shift to switch places, and the triggering attack hits you instead of the target.
true After the triggering attack has been resolved, either you or the target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

power.title: Martial Vigor
power.fluff: When your attack connects, you experience a burst of confidence your allies can share if they follow your lead
power.section: Trigger:You hit an enemy with a martial melee or ranged attack, or trigger a martial attack by hitting with a melee or ranged attack
true Effect:You can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.

true Until the start of your next turn, whenever an ally hits the triggering enemy with an attack made during any extra action gained by spending an action point, he or she can also spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

power.title: Phalanx Formation
power.fluff: You and your allies link shields for better defense
power.section: You can remain in the stance if you stop using a shield, but you cannot gain any benefit from it until you are again using a shield.
Effect:You assume the Phalanx Formation stance.
Until the stance ends, allies adjacent to you gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex.
If the ally is using a shield, the power bonus increases to +3 and you also gain the bonus.

power.title: Polearm Vault
power.fluff: You fly over the heads of friend or foe with a vault leveraged by your polearm
power.section: Requirement:You must be wielding a Polearm.
Effect:Move at least 2 squares and up to 4 squares, ignoring difficult and hindering terrain.
During this movement, you can enter an enemy's space but can't end the move there.

power.title: Quick Step
power.fluff: You spur an ally to move faster
power.section: true Effect:Until the end of your next turn, the target gains a +2 power bonus to speed.
true 1 Sustain Minor:The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Reassuring Gesture
power.fluff: Verbal reassurance is good, but a hearty clap on the shoulder is better
power.section: Trigger:An ally uses your draw inspiration class power

true Effect:The target also gains temporary hit points from your draw inspiration class power. The temporary hit points equal the additional d6s from draw inspiration + your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.

power.title: Reorient the Axis
power.fluff: You realize that your allies need to adjust their formation, so you order them to move

section.name: Target:
section.target: each ally in your warlord's aura

power.section: true Effect:Each target can shift a number of squares equal to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier as a free reaction.

power.title: Rousing Words
power.fluff: As your ally's spirit wanes, you manage to pick just the right words to inspire him or her

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, or one ally in your warlord's aura

power.section: true Effect:The target can spend one or two healing surges to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value for each surge spent.
true 1 Inspiring Presence:The target regains additional hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Stand Fast
power.fluff: You and your companions form an immovable wall to withstand the enemy tide
power.section: true Effect:Until the end of your next turn, you and allies in your warlord's aura cannot be knocked prone, pushed, pulled, or slid.
true Also, if an ally uses your draw inspiration classs power before the end of your next turn, that ally can stand up as part of that action.

true 1 Inspiring Presence:Choose one defense. Any ally that uses your draw inspiration class power also gains a power bonus to the chosen defense equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of his or her next turn.
true 1 Resourceful Presence:Any ally that uses your draw inspiration also gains a power bonus to all defenses equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier until the end of his or her next turn.
true 1 Skirmishing Presence:Any ally that uses your draw inspiration can also shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier as part of taking the action.
true 1 Tactical Presence:Any ally that uses your draw inspiration also gains a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier until the end of his or her next turn.

power.title: Stand Proud
power.fluff: You fortify your allies with words of encouragement

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and each ally in your warlord's aura

power.section: true Effect:Each target regains hit points equal to 5 + your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.
true 1 Level 11:Equal to 10 + your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.
true 1 Level 21:Equal to 20 + your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.

power.title: Tactical Supervision
power.fluff: You lend your expertise to your ally to help him or her strike a foe
power.section: Trigger:An ally within 10 squares of you makes a basic attack, a bull rush or a charge
true Effect:The target gains a power bonus to the triggering attack roll equal to one-half your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

true 1 Inspiring Presence:If the triggering attack hits, the creature the target attacked takes a penalty to attack rolls with the first attack it makes before the end of the target's next turn. The penalty equals your Charisma modifier.

true 1 Resourceful Presence:If the triggering attack hits, the target gains a power bonus to all defenses against the creature he or she attacked equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier. The bonus lasts until the end of the target's next turn.
true 1 Skirmishing Presence:If the triggering attack hits, the target can shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier after the attack has been resolved.
true 1 Tactical Presence:If the triggering attack deals damage, it deals additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Tempting Target
power.fluff: You invite attack and distract your foes in the process
power.section: true Effect:You assume the Tempting Target stance.
true Until the stance ends, you gain the following effects:
true 1 You grant combat advantage for melee and close attacks made against you.
true 1 Enemies adjacent to you grant combat advantage to your allies.
true 1 An adjacent enemy that misses you with an attack gains vulnerable all until the start of its next turn. The vulnerable equals one-half your [Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma] modifier.
